Museums & Adventure Worlds

Museums, adventure worlds and culture invite you to discover

Not only small museums await you, however true adventure worlds. For example, feel the climate along the 8th degree of longitude and explore the various climate zones. Or, authentically experience European emigration and immigration history in the German Emigration Center. Take an extraordinary journey through time in the Historical Museum. Are you interested in maritime topics? Then you should visit the German Maritime Museum with the famous Hansekogge.

An experience for young and old is certainly the Zoo at the Sea with the North Sea Aquarium. Here you can marvel polar bears, seals, penguins, barnacles and others. In the Shop WIndow Fishery Harbor you will find the Expedition Northern Seas, which gives you an insight into the habitats of the fish from the North Sea.

Bremerhaven's cultural is rich, so that art lovers will naturally also get their fill - ranging from historical masterpieces to modern installations you can surely discover specialties. We look forward to greet you!
